identify_gene_by_homology(method[, ...])

This function identifies genes by homology using blastp. :Parameters: * method (str) -- The method to be used for the homology search. * query_path (str) -- The path to the query file. * results_path (str) -- The path to the result file.

identify_gene_by_homology_from_ec(method, ...)

This function identifies genes by homology using blastp. :Parameters: * method (str) -- The method to be used for the homology search. * ec_number (str) -- The EC number of the enzyme.
identify_gene_by_homology(method: str, query_path: str = None, results_path: str = None)

This function identifies genes by homology using blastp. :Parameters: * method (str) – The method to be used for the homology search.

  • query_path (str) – The path to the query file.

  • results_path (str) – The path to the result file.

identify_gene_by_homology_from_ec(method: str, ec_number: str)

This function identifies genes by homology using blastp. :Parameters: * method (str) – The method to be used for the homology search.

  • ec_number (str) – The EC number of the enzyme.
